content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":48851,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前は要らん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't need you."},{"lineNumber":48852,"originalJapaneseLine":"　先に帰ってメシの準備でもしておけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Go home ahead and prepare the meal or something.\""},{"lineNumber":48853,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、でも…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, but...\""},{"lineNumber":48854,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そのついでに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...And while you're at it,"},{"lineNumber":48855,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リズナちゃんの話し相手でもしておけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"keep Lizna company and talk with her."},{"lineNumber":48856,"originalJapaneseLine":"　寂しがりやだからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"She's a lonely one.\""},{"lineNumber":48857,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":48858,"originalJapaneseLine":"（あぁ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Ah...)"},{"lineNumber":48859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こっちが終わったら、俺も行く」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Once I'm done here, I'll come too.\""},{"lineNumber":48860,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのまま、ランスは背を向けて前線へと歩き始めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Without another word, Rance turned his back and began walking towards the front line."},{"lineNumber":48861,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はいっ。ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes, Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":48862,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"..............\""},{"lineNumber":48863,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの横を、何も言わないままウルザが歩く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Uurza walked beside Rance without saying a word."},{"lineNumber":48864,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ふん。人類なんぞ、どうでもいいわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph. Humanity doesn't matter to me."},{"lineNumber":48865,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺は俺の女のためだけに戦うんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I fight only for my woman.\""},{"lineNumber":48866,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。みんなで、勝ちましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. Let's all win together.\""},{"lineNumber":48867,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmph.\""},{"lineNumber":48868,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはもうひとつ鼻を鳴らして、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance snorted once more,"},{"lineNumber":48869,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵中へと突っ込んでいった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and charged into the enemy lines."},{"lineNumber":48870,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおらぁーーーーーーっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uoraaahhhhhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":48871,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス総統様のお通りじゃーーーー！！","translatedEnglishLine":"Here comes Supreme Commander Rance!!"},{"lineNumber":48872,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全部殺ーーーーーす！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll kill them all!!\""},{"lineNumber":48873,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うわぁぁぁぁーーーーっ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-Uwaaaaaahhh!!\""},{"lineNumber":48874,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス首都、ラグナロックアークは解放された。","translatedEnglishLine":"The capital of Zeth, Ragnarok Arc, was liberated."},{"lineNumber":48875,"originalJapaneseLine":"――魔法の国、ゼス。","translatedEnglishLine":"—The magical country, Zeth."},{"lineNumber":48876,"originalJapaneseLine":"その地は、まだかろうじて、そう呼ばれていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"That land was still barely called that."},{"lineNumber":48877,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティア、メディウサという魔人の暴威を","translatedEnglishLine":"Though they had repelled the demonic rampages of Galtia and Medusa,"},{"lineNumber":48878,"originalJapaneseLine":"退けはしたものの、戦況は悪化の一途を辿っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the state of the war continued to worsen relentlessly."},{"lineNumber":48879,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ツォトン率いる魔軍の数、","translatedEnglishLine":"The armies of monsters led by the great general Tzoton,"},{"lineNumber":48880,"originalJapaneseLine":"およそ","translatedEnglishLine":"approximately"},{"lineNumber":48881,"originalJapaneseLine":"。","translatedEnglishLine":"."},{"lineNumber":48882,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガルティアのように死なない道を与えるでもなく。","translatedEnglishLine":"They offered no way to avoid death like Galtia did."},{"lineNumber":48883,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサのように残虐な趣味に耽るでもなく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nor did they indulge in the cruel pastimes like Medusa."},{"lineNumber":48884,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただただ圧倒的な戦力が国土を蹂躙し、","translatedEnglishLine":"They simply ravaged the land with overwhelming force,"},{"lineNumber":48885,"originalJapaneseLine":"疲弊の極にあるゼスを、押し潰そうとしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"attempting to crush the exhausted Zeth."},{"lineNumber":48886,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍はその大兵力を活かし、戦線を拡大。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army utilized their massive forces to expand the front lines."},{"lineNumber":48887,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスの各地を休み無く攻める事で、その被害を広げ続けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"By unceasingly attacking all over Zeth, they continued to widen the damage."},{"lineNumber":48888,"originalJapaneseLine":"テープを拠点とした東部戦線は、","translatedEnglishLine":"The eastern front, based in Tape,"},{"lineNumber":48889,"originalJapaneseLine":"炎軍サイアス、氷軍ウスピラの両将軍が防衛を担当。","translatedEnglishLine":"was defended by Generals Saias of the Flame Army and Uspira of the Ice Army."},{"lineNumber":48890,"originalJapaneseLine":"幾度も撤退と奪還を繰り返し、消耗しつつ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Though repeatedly retreating and recapturing, growing exhausted,"},{"lineNumber":48891,"originalJapaneseLine":"遅滞戦術を続けていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"they continued delay tactics."},{"lineNumber":48892,"originalJapaneseLine":"JAPANの狂戦士集団、毛利家の援護により戦線の維持には","translatedEnglishLine":"With support from the berserker faction of JAPAN, the Mouri clan, the front lines were maintained,"},{"lineNumber":48893,"originalJapaneseLine":"成功していたが、その毛利軍も既に数は当初の1/3に減じていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"but the Mouri forces had already reduced to one-third of their original numbers."},{"lineNumber":48894,"originalJapaneseLine":"光軍と雷軍を統括し、西部戦線を支えるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"The commander overseeing the Light and Thunder armies, supporting the western front,"},{"lineNumber":48895,"originalJapaneseLine":"カバッハーン・ザ・ライトニング。","translatedEnglishLine":"was Kabahaan the Lightning."},{"lineNumber":48896,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサの手による指揮官の減少、","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to the decrease of commanders caused by Medusa,"},{"lineNumber":48897,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてこの戦線の拡大策により、最も打撃を被った軍でもある。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the strategy to expand the front lines, his army was one of the hardest hit."},{"lineNumber":48898,"originalJapaneseLine":"この思慮深く経験豊富な、そして戦局に独力で影響を与えうる","translatedEnglishLine":"Without this thoughtful, experienced, and independently influential old mage,"},{"lineNumber":48899,"originalJapaneseLine":"老魔法使いでなければ、王都は既に再陥落していたのは確実だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"it was certain that the royal capital would have already fallen again."},{"lineNumber":48900,"originalJapaneseLine":"北部から東西合流を狙う魔軍に対し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Against the demon army aiming to merge east and west from the north,"},{"lineNumber":48901,"originalJapaneseLine":"総司令官山田千鶴子はアニス・沢渡を投入。","translatedEnglishLine":"Supreme Commander Chizuko Yamada deployed Anis Sawatari."},{"lineNumber":48902,"originalJapaneseLine":"味方の被害を軽微に、魔軍の被害を甚大に、","translatedEnglishLine":"With minimal friendly casualties and severe damage to the demon army,"},{"lineNumber":48903,"originalJapaneseLine":"繰り返し合流の妨害に成功していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"she repeatedly succeeded in disrupting their union."},{"lineNumber":48904,"originalJapaneseLine":"各地とも、決定的な崩壊を食い止めているだけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Everywhere, they were only managing to prevent a decisive collapse,"},{"lineNumber":48905,"originalJapaneseLine":"奇跡と言える状況であった。","translatedEnglishLine":"a situation that could only be called a miracle."},{"lineNumber":48906,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラグナロックアークとテープを結ぶ防衛線も三度に渡って脅かされ、","translatedEnglishLine":"The defense line linking Ragnarok Arc and Tape was threatened three times,"},{"lineNumber":48907,"originalJapaneseLine":"山田千鶴子率いる王国親衛隊の出撃も、半ば常態化している。","translatedEnglishLine":"and sorties by the royal guard led by Chizuko Yamada were becoming semi-routine."},{"lineNumber":48908,"originalJapaneseLine":"状況は絶望的。それでもゼス軍は魔軍の攻勢を必死に凌ぎ、","translatedEnglishLine":"The situation was desperate. Still, the Zeth army desperately held off the demon army's offensives,"},{"lineNumber":48909,"originalJapaneseLine":"滅亡のその日を、先延ばしにしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"delaying the day of their destruction."},{"lineNumber":48910,"originalJapaneseLine":"――ゼス戦線は、膠着状態が続いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"—The Zeth front lines remained in a stalemate."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前は要らん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't need you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先に帰ってメシの準備でもしておけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Go home ahead and prepare the meal or something."
"Eh, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そのついでに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...And while you're at it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リズナちゃんの話し相手でもしておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: keep Lizna company and talk with her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寂しがりやだからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's a lonely one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちが終わったら、俺も行く」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Once I'm done here, I'll come too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま、ランスは背を向けて前線へと歩き始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without another word, Rance turned his back and began walking towards the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……はいっ。ランス様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yes, Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの横を、何も言わないままウルザが歩く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uurza walked beside Rance without saying a word.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ふん。人類なんぞ、どうでもいいわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmph. Humanity doesn't matter to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は俺の女のためだけに戦うんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I fight only for my woman."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。みんなで、勝ちましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. Let's all win together."
"...Hmph."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはもうひとつ鼻を鳴らして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance snorted once more,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵中へと突っ込んでいった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and charged into the enemy lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおらぁーーーーーーっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uoraaahhhhhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス総統様のお通りじゃーーーー！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here comes Supreme Commander Rance!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全部殺ーーーーーす！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll kill them all!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うわぁぁぁぁーーーーっ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-Uwaaaaaahhh!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス首都、ラグナロックアークは解放された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The capital of Zeth, Ragnarok Arc, was liberated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――魔法の国、ゼス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —The magical country, Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その地は、まだかろうじて、そう呼ばれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That land was still barely called that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティア、メディウサという魔人の暴威を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though they had repelled the demonic rampages of Galtia and Medusa,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 退けはしたものの、戦況は悪化の一途を辿っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the state of the war continued to worsen relentlessly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトン率いる魔軍の数、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The armies of monsters led by the great general Tzoton,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: およそ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: approximately

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアのように死なない道を与えるでもなく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They offered no way to avoid death like Galtia did.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサのように残虐な趣味に耽るでもなく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nor did they indulge in the cruel pastimes like Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただただ圧倒的な戦力が国土を蹂躙し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They simply ravaged the land with overwhelming force,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲弊の極にあるゼスを、押し潰そうとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attempting to crush the exhausted Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍はその大兵力を活かし、戦線を拡大。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army utilized their massive forces to expand the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの各地を休み無く攻める事で、その被害を広げ続けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By unceasingly attacking all over Zeth, they continued to widen the damage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テープを拠点とした東部戦線は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The eastern front, based in Tape,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 炎軍サイアス、氷軍ウスピラの両将軍が防衛を担当。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was defended by Generals Saias of the Flame Army and Uspira of the Ice Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幾度も撤退と奪還を繰り返し、消耗しつつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though repeatedly retreating and recapturing, growing exhausted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遅滞戦術を続けていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they continued delay tactics.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPANの狂戦士集団、毛利家の援護により戦線の維持には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With support from the berserker faction of JAPAN, the Mouri clan, the front lines were maintained,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 成功していたが、その毛利軍も既に数は当初の1/3に減じていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the Mouri forces had already reduced to one-third of their original numbers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 光軍と雷軍を統括し、西部戦線を支えるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The commander overseeing the Light and Thunder armies, supporting the western front,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カバッハーン・ザ・ライトニング。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was Kabahaan the Lightning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの手による指揮官の減少、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to the decrease of commanders caused by Medusa,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてこの戦線の拡大策により、最も打撃を被った軍でもある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the strategy to expand the front lines, his army was one of the hardest hit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この思慮深く経験豊富な、そして戦局に独力で影響を与えうる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without this thoughtful, experienced, and independently influential old mage,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 老魔法使いでなければ、王都は既に再陥落していたのは確実だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was certain that the royal capital would have already fallen again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北部から東西合流を狙う魔軍に対し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against the demon army aiming to merge east and west from the north,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総司令官山田千鶴子はアニス・沢渡を投入。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supreme Commander Chizuko Yamada deployed Anis Sawatari.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味方の被害を軽微に、魔軍の被害を甚大に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With minimal friendly casualties and severe damage to the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 繰り返し合流の妨害に成功していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she repeatedly succeeded in disrupting their union.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地とも、決定的な崩壊を食い止めているだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everywhere, they were only managing to prevent a decisive collapse,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡と言える状況であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a situation that could only be called a miracle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアークとテープを結ぶ防衛線も三度に渡って脅かされ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The defense line linking Ragnarok Arc and Tape was threatened three times,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山田千鶴子率いる王国親衛隊の出撃も、半ば常態化している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and sorties by the royal guard led by Chizuko Yamada were becoming semi-routine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況は絶望的。それでもゼス軍は魔軍の攻勢を必死に凌ぎ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation was desperate. Still, the Zeth army desperately held off the demon army's offensives,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 滅亡のその日を、先延ばしにしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: delaying the day of their destruction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――ゼス戦線は、膠着状態が続いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —The Zeth front lines remained in a stalemate.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Still, the Zeth army desperately held off the demon army's offensives,"},{"lineNumber":48909,"originalJapaneseLine":"滅亡のその日を、先延ばしにしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"delaying the day of their destruction."},{"lineNumber":48910,"originalJapaneseLine":"――ゼス戦線は、膠着状態が続いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"—The Zeth front lines remained in a stalemate."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前は要らん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't need you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先に帰ってメシの準備でもしておけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Go home ahead and prepare the meal or something."
"Eh, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そのついでに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...And while you're at it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リズナちゃんの話し相手でもしておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: keep Lizna company and talk with her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寂しがりやだからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's a lonely one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちが終わったら、俺も行く」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Once I'm done here, I'll come too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま、ランスは背を向けて前線へと歩き始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without another word, Rance turned his back and began walking towards the front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……はいっ。ランス様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yes, Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの横を、何も言わないままウルザが歩く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uurza walked beside Rance without saying a word.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ふん。人類なんぞ、どうでもいいわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmph. Humanity doesn't matter to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は俺の女のためだけに戦うんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I fight only for my woman."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい。みんなで、勝ちましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes. Let's all win together."
"...Hmph."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはもうひとつ鼻を鳴らして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance snorted once more,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵中へと突っ込んでいった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and charged into the enemy lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおらぁーーーーーーっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uoraaahhhhhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス総統様のお通りじゃーーーー！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here comes Supreme Commander Rance!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全部殺ーーーーーす！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll kill them all!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うわぁぁぁぁーーーーっ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-Uwaaaaaahhh!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス首都、ラグナロックアークは解放された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The capital of Zeth, Ragnarok Arc, was liberated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――魔法の国、ゼス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —The magical country, Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その地は、まだかろうじて、そう呼ばれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That land was still barely called that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティア、メディウサという魔人の暴威を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though they had repelled the demonic rampages of Galtia and Medusa,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 退けはしたものの、戦況は悪化の一途を辿っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the state of the war continued to worsen relentlessly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトン率いる魔軍の数、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The armies of monsters led by the great general Tzoton,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: およそ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: approximately

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガルティアのように死なない道を与えるでもなく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They offered no way to avoid death like Galtia did.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサのように残虐な趣味に耽るでもなく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nor did they indulge in the cruel pastimes like Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただただ圧倒的な戦力が国土を蹂躙し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They simply ravaged the land with overwhelming force,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲弊の極にあるゼスを、押し潰そうとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attempting to crush the exhausted Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍はその大兵力を活かし、戦線を拡大。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army utilized their massive forces to expand the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスの各地を休み無く攻める事で、その被害を広げ続けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By unceasingly attacking all over Zeth, they continued to widen the damage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テープを拠点とした東部戦線は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The eastern front, based in Tape,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 炎軍サイアス、氷軍ウスピラの両将軍が防衛を担当。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was defended by Generals Saias of the Flame Army and Uspira of the Ice Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幾度も撤退と奪還を繰り返し、消耗しつつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though repeatedly retreating and recapturing, growing exhausted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遅滞戦術を続けていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they continued delay tactics.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPANの狂戦士集団、毛利家の援護により戦線の維持には
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With support from the berserker faction of JAPAN, the Mouri clan, the front lines were maintained,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 成功していたが、その毛利軍も既に数は当初の1/3に減じていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the Mouri forces had already reduced to one-third of their original numbers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 光軍と雷軍を統括し、西部戦線を支えるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The commander overseeing the Light and Thunder armies, supporting the western front,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カバッハーン・ザ・ライトニング。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was Kabahaan the Lightning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサの手による指揮官の減少、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to the decrease of commanders caused by Medusa,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてこの戦線の拡大策により、最も打撃を被った軍でもある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the strategy to expand the front lines, his army was one of the hardest hit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この思慮深く経験豊富な、そして戦局に独力で影響を与えうる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without this thoughtful, experienced, and independently influential old mage,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 老魔法使いでなければ、王都は既に再陥落していたのは確実だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was certain that the royal capital would have already fallen again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北部から東西合流を狙う魔軍に対し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against the demon army aiming to merge east and west from the north,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総司令官山田千鶴子はアニス・沢渡を投入。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supreme Commander Chizuko Yamada deployed Anis Sawatari.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 味方の被害を軽微に、魔軍の被害を甚大に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With minimal friendly casualties and severe damage to the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 繰り返し合流の妨害に成功していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she repeatedly succeeded in disrupting their union.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地とも、決定的な崩壊を食い止めているだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everywhere, they were only managing to prevent a decisive collapse,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奇跡と言える状況であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a situation that could only be called a miracle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラグナロックアークとテープを結ぶ防衛線も三度に渡って脅かされ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The defense line linking Ragnarok Arc and Tape was threatened three times,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山田千鶴子率いる王国親衛隊の出撃も、半ば常態化している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and sorties by the royal guard led by Chizuko Yamada were becoming semi-routine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況は絶望的。それでもゼス軍は魔軍の攻勢を必死に凌ぎ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation was desperate. Still, the Zeth army desperately held off the demon army's offensives,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 滅亡のその日を、先延ばしにしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: delaying the day of their destruction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――ゼス戦線は、膠着状態が続いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —The Zeth front lines remained in a stalemate.
